title: Pouring Into the Lives of Your Grandkids
itunes:summary:
Grandparents are an integral part of the family, passing along wisdom, faith, and love. While many of the "rules" of grandparenting are timeless, some of the games have changed. Chrys Howard and Shellie Tomlinson will help you better understand the unique role you have in supporting your adult children and influencing your grandchildren.


Receive the book "Rocking It Grand" and the audio download of the broadcast "Pouring Into the Lives of Your Grandkids " for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-10-10?refcd=1495106


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/fortifying-your-marriage-for-the-storms-of-life-part-1-of-2/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
